argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | unicls.1 | |- J e. Top |
| 2 |  | unicls.2 | |- X = U. J |
| 3 | 2 | #P_cldss2 | |- ( Clsd ` J ) C_ ~P X |
| 4 |  | #P_sspwuni | |- ( ( Clsd ` J ) C_ ~P X <-> U. ( Clsd ` J ) C_ X ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpbi | |- U. ( Clsd ` J ) C_ X |
| 6 | 2 | #P_topcld | |- ( J e. Top -> X e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_ax-mp | |- X e. ( Clsd ` J ) |
| 8 |  | #P_unissel | |- ( ( U. ( Clsd ` J ) C_ X /\ X e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> U. ( Clsd ` J ) = X ) |
| 9 | 5, 7, 8 | #P_mp2an | |- U. ( Clsd ` J ) = X |
